Code: 15Disc20Spon REGISTER <http://2015.hadoopsummit.org/san-jose/register/> Pivotal Perspectives - Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Amazon Web Services May 13, 2015
Whilst you have always been able to deploy Cloud Foundry onto Amazon Web Services using BOSH—you needed good BOSH skills to make it happen. With version 1.4 of Pivotal Cloud Foundry, this is now all handled by the Ops Manager.
Subscribe <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal> New GE Performance Whitepaper Shows Pivotal GemFire To Be Industrial Strength May 12, 2015
A technical white paper recently published by GE Power & Water and GE Global Research highlights the benefits of running Pivotal products for storing large amounts of data, while simultaneously taking in new data and deploying real-time analysis.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/case-studies-2/new-ge-performance-whitepaper-shows-pivotal-gemfire-to-be-industrial-strength> Pivotal HD Adds Apache Hadoop Components, Cozies Up to ODP May 11, 2015
Less than 90 days after helping establish and joining the Open Data Platform initiative, Pivotal has announced the availability of Pivotal HD 3.0, now aligned with the standardized Open Data Platform (ODP) core consisting of Apache Hadoop® and Apache Ambari.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/products/pivotal-hd-adds-apache-hadoop-components-cozies-up-to-odp> VISIT OUR P.O.V. BLOG <http://blog.pivotal.io> Pivotal People - Mark Secrist on Big Data Education, Open Source Software, and Free Training May 13, 2015
Training on big data, in-memory, data science tools have never been more popular. With over 25 years of development and training in his background, Pivotal’s Mark Secrist, the first U.S. based trainer for the Spring Framework at VMware, Mark Secrist spentthe first U.S.-based Spring trainer, gives us a question and answer session about Pivotal Education. He explains why he is passionate about training, where Spring overlaps with Pivotal’s Big Data Suite, and the differences between open and closed source product training. He also explains that we are hiring in his department.
